features: ❤Bubble Stress Game: 2023 Latest Pop Game Machine can keep kids engaged and entertained for hours, effectively helping to reduce screen time and beat boredom, while also serving as a stress reliever for adults. A good helper to relieve work, study, family, office stress and generate happiness. It can be pushed to break through the level by fast, in the challenge of positive thinking, quick reaction, exercise the attention, memory, reaction, hand-eye coordination and hands-on ability.

❤Minimalist Style Design: Features only four buttons - sound, power, switch mode, and the whole raised button on the back is the confirmation button. The game pop is equipped with a sensor device, and players just need to turn off the lights in succession by pushing the pops, and then press the confirmation button on the backside. The operation is simple, easy to learn, and perfect for all ages.

❤Four game modes: Contains Breakout Mode, Memory Mode, Scoring Mode and Multiplayer Mode. Each mode has different difficulties, which helps to exercise children's reaction speed and memory. Multiplayer mode can increase parent-child interaction and develop children's sense of competition and team spirit. Machine volume adjustable up to 4 levels (including mute)

❤Compact and Portable: The game console is portable and can be easily enjoyed indoors, outdoors or even while traveling at anytime and anywhere; with and vivid sound effects and music design is the best choice for leisure and entertainment. Increase child's entertainment options and stay away from the TV and computer. With all accessories are included!

👍Materials Safe and High Quality: Made of high quality ABS and silicone materials, not easy to break. Ergonomic design, comfortable to use. The game console is not only suitable for children. Adults can also benefit from the entertaining effects of these toys. Help you to concentrate and eliminate boredom.

🎁Excellent Gift Choice: This toy is in astronaut shape, perfect for children, teenagers and even adults. Comes with a colorful box, perfect gift for birthdays, Children's Day, Thanksgiving, Halloween, Christmas, New Year and other festivals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whole family loved this
reviews.reviewText: Everyone had a blast playing with this at Christmas! MY 20 year old often steals it from my 9 year old to play it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for adults too!
reviews.reviewText: I love little handheld games, but I got this to use for memory games to try to enhance my memory. The little bubbles are also just like the pop bubbles on those stress toys you get for anxiety. This little game is fun and serves a good purpose and I think kids and adults would appreciate this cute little game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great kid/teenager gift!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a pretty cool little gift to give someone who likes mini games! The quality of the plastic is not too bad and the colors are very vibrant, the only thing that I noticed so far is that the bubbles sometimes don’t pop back out when you push the button on the back. Overall very good product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kid
reviews.reviewText: Great for kids who need something to do with their hands all the time. My daughter loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a couple of these off Tiktok. These buttons were so easy to push on this version that you constantly press the button wrong or the buttons don’t pop back up when resetting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TikTok made me get this.......and I'm obsessed like everyone else!
reviews.reviewText: Simple pleasure!! When I saw this little game on TikTok, I knew I had to get my hands on it! This is a great stress reliever without a screen!! Step away from social media for a bit with this addictive game! I love that you can control how loud the game is INCLUDING a mute option (which is what I play on most of the time or very low.) Super portable. The little astronaut at the top is too cute and is perfect to go along with any space theme. I also think that it is super fun that there are four different game modes that you can play on! Easy little stocking stuffer or just as a cute small gift. This game takes batteries but it comes with batteries when you buy it so that is really thoughtful and nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun Addicting Game
reviews.reviewText: This game is super fun and easy to play. I got it for my kids but have been playing it a lot myself! I have seen it all over social media and it is definitely worth the hype. My 5 and 8 year old enjoy playing with it and it keeps them occupied. It’s so easy to play even my 3.5 year old can play it.
